title: What is going on???? My ping is 81, but I cannot see a dang thing going on! I
body: I know my internet is fine, because my family was watching Netflix, and it was coming in fine. But for the past few hours, my League has been completely messed up. I've been telephoning around, cannot see any attacks, and am acting like someone with 700 ping. How can I fix this????

replies.body: That teleporting around sounds a lot like your network is having some problems with packet loss, which could be related to the netflix streaming or just the way your connection is being routed to our servers. Do me a favor and use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) really quick so I can get an idea of what your connection looks like on it's way to the servers.
